comment: Taking his class was the best decision of my life, because he is the craziest, funniest, weirdest, person I've ever met in my entire life. He cracks me up the entire class.  His comments & sayings are hilarious. Today he said, "forgive me father for I have sinned, I'm knocked up".
TAKE HIM TAKE HIM TAKE HIM! You absolutely will not regret him. Best professor I have ever had. Period.

Of my four years at KSU, Dr. Kirby is easily my favorite professor. He is extremely helpful, fair, and understanding. He actually made the writing process enjoyable. Attendance is recommended, but he's really not a stickler. He got to know each student on an individual level. I could go on, but I'll just say take Dr. Kirby if you get the chance!!

I absolutely love this professor. I can honestly say that he is the best professor I've had in college. I've learned more in his class about my abilities as a writer than ever before. His classes are a joy to attend. The work is useful. His lectures are knowledgeable and passionate, but he's also hilarious. I would take any class that he teaches.
